Feedback_Question_SetupObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Feedback_Question_SetupObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Feedback_Question_SetupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Contains the reference that identifies the feedback question instance.

Feedback_Question_Data.description: ID of the feedback question. Specify either the WID or "Feedback_Question_Setup_ID=12345".

Question_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Question_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Question_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Feedback_Question_Data.description: The type of the question. Valid values: TEXT, DATE, NUMERIC, MULTIPLE_CHOICE_SINGLE_SELECT, MULTIPLE_CHOICE_MULTI_SELECT.

Question_Multiple_Choice_Answer_Data.description: Question Multiple Choice Answer Order is required when question type is multiple choice answer.
Question Multiple Choice Answer Text is required when question type is multiple choice answer.

validation.validation: Question Multiple Choice Answer Order is required when question type is multiple choice answer.
validation.description: Question Multiple Choice Answer Order is required when question type is multiple choice answer.

validation.validation: Question Multiple Choice Answer Text is required when question type is multiple choice answer.
validation.description: Question Multiple Choice Answer Text is required when question type is multiple choice answer.

validation.validation: Submit the current ID to edit this question. The question multiple choice answer ID [current ID] was used for an older version of this question.
validation.description: Submit the current ID to edit this question. The question multiple choice answer ID provided was used for an older version of this question.

validation.validation: Use alpha numeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) to specify question multiple choice answer order.
validation.description: Use alpha numeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) to specify question multiple choice answer order.

validation.validation: Enter a unique possible answer for each multiple choice question. The answer [answer] is already in use for this question [name].
validation.description: Enter a unique possible answer for each multiple choice question. The answer submitted is already in use for this question.

validation.validation: The Question Multiple Choice Answer ID [id] is already used by another question.
validation.description: This Question Multiple Choice Answer ID is already used in by another question.

Question_Multiple_Choice_Answer_With_Sco.description: Question Multiple Choice Answer Score is an optional integer when question type is multiple choice answer.

Feedback_Question_Data.description: Contains multiple choice answer with score data.

validation.validation: Enter the required Order and Text for each multiple choice answer that belongs to question [name].
validation.description: Enter the required Order and Text for each multiple choice answer that belongs to this question.

Question_TagObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Question_TagObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Question_TagObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Feedback_Question_Data.description: ID of the question tag. Specify either the WID or "Question_Tag_ID=12345". You can specify multiple question tags.
The number of feedback template(s) that this question is used in.
Indicates whether or not the feedback question is used in a requested feedback event or included in a feedback template.

validation.validation: Multiple choice questions must have between 2 and 25 answers. Correct possible answers for question [name] to continue.
validation.description: Multiple choice questions must have between 2 and 25 answers.

validation.validation: You can't delete a feedback question that's in use.
validation.description: You can't delete a feedback question that's in use.

validation.validation: You can’t have possible answers for questions other than Multiple Choice type. Delete possible answers for question [name] to continue.
validation.description: You can't have possible answers for questions other than Multiple Choice type. Delete possible answers for question to continue.

description: If "Y", the instance specified in the Feedback Question Reference or the ID field of the Feedback Question Data will be deleted. The specified ID must be valid.
